general_faq.question: What is NovaTech Solutions?
general_faq.answer: NovaTech is a Bengaluru‑based SaaS company offering a unified software suite for CRM, HRM, Helpdesk, and BI. We empower businesses through intelligent software that bridges customer engagement, workforce operations, and decision-making.

general_faq.question: What products does NovaTech offer?
general_faq.answer: We offer four main products: NovaCRM (₹2,499/month) for sales teams, NovaHR (₹4,199/month) for HR departments, NovaDesk (₹3,299/month) for IT support, and NovaAnalytics (₹4,999/month) for business intelligence. All products come with 14-day free trials.

general_faq.question: Do you offer annual plans with discounts?
general_faq.answer: Yes! Annual subscriptions save you ~15% compared to monthly pricing. We also offer volume discounts for 50+ users and custom enterprise pricing for 500+ users.

general_faq.question: What happens when my free trial ends?
general_faq.answer: You'll get an email reminder before trial expiry. After that, you can upgrade to a paid plan or export your data. We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied.

general_faq.question: Can users from different office locations collaborate?
general_faq.answer: Yes, NovaCloud supports global collaboration—data syncs across all geo-locations in real time. All our products are cloud-based and accessible from anywhere.

general_faq.question: Is there user-level role control?
general_faq.answer: All products include role-based access and permissions in admin settings. You can customize user roles and permissions based on your organization's needs.

faqs.question: Can I integrate NovaCRM with Salesforce?
faqs.answer: Yes, NovaCRM connects seamlessly with Salesforce via API and Zapier. We also integrate with Google Workspace and Microsoft Teams.

faqs.question: Does NovaCRM support email campaigns?
faqs.answer: Yes, NovaCRM includes built-in email campaign management with templates, automation, and analytics to track campaign performance.

faqs.question: Does NovaHR handle payroll compliance?
faqs.answer: Yes, NovaHR integrates with HRUnity for payroll compliance and tax calculations. It handles local regulations and automates compliance reporting.

faqs.question: Can NovaHR track employee performance?
faqs.answer: Yes, NovaHR includes performance management features with goal setting, reviews, and analytics to track employee development.

faqs.question: How does NovaDesk's AI automation work?
faqs.answer: NovaDesk uses AI to automatically categorize tickets, suggest solutions from the knowledge base, and route tickets to the right agents based on expertise.

faqs.question: Can NovaDesk integrate with Slack?
faqs.answer: Yes, NovaDesk integrates with Slack, Microsoft Teams, and email systems for seamless ticket management across your communication platforms.

faqs.question: Can NovaAnalytics alert me if sales drop?
faqs.answer: Yes! With NovaAnalytics, you can set smart alerts that notify you when sales dip below thresholds or when other key metrics change.

faqs.question: Does NovaAnalytics connect with other NovaTech products?
faqs.answer: Yes, NovaAnalytics integrates with NovaCRM, NovaHR, and NovaDesk to provide unified analytics across all your business operations.

technical_faq.question: What is your technology stack?
technical_faq.answer: We use Python (Django/FastAPI) for backend, React.js with Material-UI for frontend, PostgreSQL for database, Redis for caching, and Kafka for event streaming. Our AI features are powered by TensorFlow.

technical_faq.question: Is NovaTech's platform secure?
technical_faq.answer: Yes, we maintain ISO 27001 and SOC2 Type II certifications. Our platform is GDPR ready and hosted on AWS with disaster recovery in Singapore.

technical_faq.question: Do you provide API access?
technical_faq.answer: Yes, we provide RESTful APIs with OAuth 2.0 authentication. Our API documentation includes example workflows and integration guides.

support_faq.question: What support options are available?
support_faq.answer: We offer email support, live chat, and phone support during business hours. Enterprise customers get dedicated account managers and priority support.

support_faq.question: Do you provide training?
support_faq.answer: Yes, we partner with EduLearn Academy to provide customer training programs, onboarding sessions, and certification programs for all our products.

support_faq.question: Where can I find documentation?
support_faq.answer: We provide comprehensive user manuals, API documentation, and video tutorials. All documentation is available in our knowledge base and YouTube channel.

billing_faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
billing_faq.answer: We accept credit cards, bank transfers, and can provide invoices for enterprise customers. All payments are processed securely.

billing_faq.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
billing_faq.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new customers.

billing_faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
billing_faq.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new customers. For existing customers, we handle refunds on a case-by-case basis.
